II. You are my wife, therefore, out of the natural affection I have for you, for the comfort of your future life, love itself as a reward, without reward, the vacant land as set out in the Schedule III below has come to me as an inheritance and has been in my possession from that date to this day, and there is no mortgage on the vacant land Having convinced myself that there are no complications, I hereby transfer the vacant land as per the Scheduled Entry with all the rights and obligations vested in me, free of charge and free of charge, by virtue of this Settlement Document and immediately transfer it to you. Therefore, the property as per the Scheduled Entry shall be registered in your name in the records of the Panchayat etc., and all taxes shall be paid by you, and the structures, etc. shall be constructed in the manner of your choice, and the use, etc. shall be carried out, and all rights of donation, sale, and right of succession shall be enjoyed by your children, grandchildren, and great-grandchildren in perpetual happiness. Neither I, nor my heirs, nor you, nor your heirs shall ever be the ones to cause any hindrance, objection, or dispute to them. Therefore, until today, This settlement deed is written and given by me as an undisputed property free from any mortgages, decrees, court seizures, inheritance rights, manovarti charges, market charges etc. If any such bindings are ever violated by anyone, I will be responsible for all such obligations and at my own expense and will keep this document intact. This is my full consent to be written and given in your name.

II. Schedule;- Vizianagaram District, Palakonda Sub Registrar's Office, Regidi Aamdalavalasa Mandal,
Venkampet Panchayat, Venkampet Village Madhura Meesala Dolapeta Village, Survey No.9 having
East - West 11 feet (3.35m),
North - South 100 feet (30.48),
i.e., the vacant land measuring 122.22 square yards (102.66 sq m) with no buildings, foundations, trees or fish ponds, is bounded by the following:
North:- My taluka vacant land
South;- C.C. Road
East;- Bonu Saraswathamma Gari's Penkutillu
West;- Muppidi Tirupati Rao Gari's Penkutillu
The vacant land in the middle is hereby acquired by you on this day through a settlement deed. The Government has not written any letter to you regarding this settlement property. These properties are not assigned properties. They are not agency properties.
Declaration;-
After examining the EC details of the property We are.
New U/s 22-B (central Act 16 of 1908) Vide Andhra Pradesh Ordinance No. 7 of2016
dated 03-12-2016 I hereby declare that the property transferred under this deed i.e. inherited by me is not owned by anyone else except me and that I have not sold, transacted or otherwise disposed of the property to anyone else till now and that I have not made any other encroachments. I am fully responsible for any discrepancies in the above.

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No. 298 of 2026, dated 29/Jan/2026, executed by Bonu Sanyasi Naidu in favour of his Wife, Bonu Rajamma towards the property admeasuring an extent of 122.22 Sq. Yds, comprised in survey number 9, situated in Venkampeta Village Madhura Meesala Dolapeta Village, Venkampeta Gram Panchayat and Regidi Aamdalavalasa Mandal, within the District of Vizianagarm, registered at sub-registrar office Palakonda, is bounded as follows: North by: Vacant Site of Donor South by: C.C. Road East by: Tailed House of Bonu Saraswatamma West by: Tailed House of Muppidi Thirupathi Rao
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
